enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
sentences: SBI Chair Bagher Asadi (Iran) opened the meeting.
UNFCCC Executive Secretary Yvo de Boer reflected on his first eight months in the post.
He expressed concern at the enormous growth in the Secretariat's workload.

He urged a long-term global response to climate change involving deep emission cuts from industrialized countries, further engagement of developing countries, incentives for action, and flexibility through an enhanced carbon market.
